channel.title: PKzscapez all about pking Minigames, Awsome Pking, V2 second release
channel.description:
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/krksk.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i46.tinypic.com/10x56jr.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i47.tinypic.com/30w582u.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/2vjdixd.jpg[/img]
Barrage/Granite Maul Combo (Near K0!) [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/35hl637.jpg[/img]
Dragon Scimitar Special Attack [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2w5ujhg.jpg[/img]
Dragon Longsword Special Attack [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/30lnvhg.jpg[/img]
Free to Play Magic [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/116t9pk.jpg[/img]
Ancient Magic [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/1zyc9cz.jpg[/img]
Bow Switching [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2isv2c2.jpg[/img]
Dragon Mace Special Attack [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/30c4rib.jpg[/img]
Dragon Scimitar Special and attacking [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/21ln5hu.jpg[/img]
Autocasting: F2P Spellbook [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/5tbhk.jpg[/img]
Autocasting Ancient spellbook. [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2dubkvb.jpg[/img]
Switching [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/213nrqs.jpg[/img]
Blood Barrage & Ice Blitz [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/149ytsz.jpg[/img]
Ice Barrage [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/jv4yki.jpg[/img]
Range on PVN base (didn't keep shooting, didn't do facing) [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/20ihqoi.jpg[/img]
Range system fixed. [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/rivk74.jpg[/img]
Crystal bow [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2dbl3yr.jpg[/img]
Server
* Clan Chat Online/Offline Status * Agility (2 courses, using events, no process) * Firemaking (simple system) * All special attacks fixed * Enchanted bolts random special effects * Barrows remade to 100% * Pest Control fixed * Fixed Combat lvl formula * Edited some quests and added "The Great Brain Robbery" * Most skill menus showing * New training areas (2xEasy, 2xMedium, 1xHard) * Impling followers(can be used for Summoning) * Farming
Client
* A lot of new interfaces including: Attack interfaces Equipment tab + screen 474 Prayer Interface(100% working server-side) New magic Interfaces Clan Chat remade Friend+Ignore slightly edited Opions tab Emote tab Minigames teleport interface * Gameframe Changer (::459(soon), ::474, ::508) updates: Tab area Chat area Chat buttons Minimap Orbs * Run Button updating Options tab one * Orbs filling and blinking * Hp bar toggle button on Options tab * Magic spells outlining * Auto Cache Updater * New 474/508 Maps and Objects * 5 backgrounds instead of 1 * Page Down Key takes Screenshots * Mod, Admin, Donator, Co-owner and Owner Crowns * A lot of updated npcs, items and emotes
[b]Download Client
[/b]*[b] Download Source[/b] [b]*[/b]

Range system fixed.

Crystal bow

Server

* Clan Chat Online/Offline Status
* Agility (2 courses, using events, no process)
* Firemaking (simple system)
* All special attacks fixed
* Enchanted bolts random special effects
* Barrows remade to 100%
* Pest Control fixed
* Fixed Combat lvl formula
* Edited some quests and added "The Great Brain Robbery"
* Most skill menus showing
* New training areas (2xEasy, 2xMedium, 1xHard)
* Impling followers(can be used for Summoning)
* Farming

Client

* A lot of new interfaces including:
  Attack interfaces
  Equipment tab + screen
  474 Prayer Interface(100% working server-side)
  New magic Interfaces
  Clan Chat remade
  Friend+Ignore slightly edited
  Opions tab
  Emote tab
  Minigames teleport interface
* Gameframe Changer (::459(soon), ::474, ::508)
  updates:
  Tab area
  Chat area
  Chat buttons
  Minimap
  Orbs
* Run Button updating Options tab one
* Orbs filling and blinking
* Hp bar toggle button on Options tab
* Magic spells outlining
* Auto Cache Updater
* New 474/508 Maps and Objects
* 5 backgrounds instead of 1
* Page Down Key takes Screenshots
* Mod, Admin, Donator, Co-owner and Owner Crowns
* A lot of updated npcs, items and emotes
